data.title: Robert De Niro: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Robert De Niro: Check out the list of all Robert De Niro movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Robert De Niro news on Times of India.
data.text:
Robert De Niro on what drew him to the film "Ezra": A personal mission to destigmatize autism

etimes.in / Jun 02, 2024, 15:06 (IST)

Robert De Niro has opened up about his personal connection to his latest movie, "Ezra," a comedy-drama directed by Tony Goldwyn. The film, which explores the challenges of raising a child with autism, resonated deeply with De Niro, who has a son with Autism Spectrum Disorder. In "Ezra," De Niro plays Stan, the grandfather of the titular character. The story follows Max Brandel, a stand-up comedian played by Bobby Cannavale, as he navigates the difficulties of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna.

Viral Rumor about Kevin Costner firing Robert De Niro debunked!

etimes.in / Jun 01, 2024, 15:40 (IST)

A viral post recently claimed that Kevin Costner had fired Robert De Niro from an upcoming movie project. However, this rumor has been debunked as a hoax. Costner is currently focused on his three-part passion project, Horizon, while De Niro is set to star in Alto Knights. The rumor started on May 29, 2024, when user posted that Kevin Costner had fired Robert De Niro, calling him "disrespectful." The post quickly went viral, causing a frenzy on social media.

Robert De Niro vs Donald Trump: A brief history of one-sided acrimony

May 30, 2024, 16:04 (IST)

Robert De Niro, in his role as a vocal Trump critic, engages in heated exchanges with supporters. Critics like David Axelrod question the timing of his actions, suggesting they may be counterproductive.

Robert De Niro calls Trump a 'clown' outside trial in Biden campaign message

Reuters / May 28, 2024, 22:42 (IST)

Actor Robert De Niro criticized Donald Trump outside the New York City courtroom where Trump's hush money trial is ongoing. De Niro, a democrat supporting Biden, highlighted Trump's threat to democracy. Referring to Trump's successful 2016 run for president, Academy Award winner De Niro said Trump's candidacy was initially laughed off as a joke.

Mark Ruffalo in talks to join cast of 'Crime 101'

PTI / May 22, 2024, 15:47 (IST)

Hollywood star Mark Ruffalo in talks to join 'Crime 101' cast with Chris Hemsworth. Directed by Bart Layton, the crime thriller is based on Don Winslow's novella, featuring detective Lou Lubesnick and 'Crime 101' rules. Further, Chris Hemsworth is also set to produce the film with a stellar production team.

Did you know Randeep Hooda worked as a waiter, drove a taxi in Melbourne for 3 years before becoming an actor?

etimes.in / Apr 16, 2024, 19:15 (IST)

Randeep Hooda, known for films like 'Sarbjit' and 'Highway,' recently directed 'Swatantrya Veer Savarkar.' Before his acting career, he worked as a night cab driver in Melbourne during his student days. Despite odd jobs, he maintained a fearless attitude. His strategic cab driving earned him a good income. Hooda's diverse experiences paved his path to success, catching the eye of director Mira Nair for 'Monsoon Wedding.'

'Raging Bull': Emmanuel Macron shows off his boxing skills on camera, and Europe notices

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Mar 22, 2024, 08:29 (IST)

French President Macron's black and white photos training with a punching bag stirred controversy in Europe. Views ranged from praise for his 'warrior' style to criticism of 'macho' and 'narcissistic' tendencies. Many interpreted the images as a call for a stronger Western response to Ukraine, amidst global debate on military involvement.

Ali Fazal shares a throwback picture from his first meeting with Robert De Niro; Dia Mirza has a connection

Feb 26, 2024, 14:22 (IST)

Actor Ali Fazal, who is making headlines for getting on board Rajkumar Santoshi's next directorial, 'Lahore 1947', took to his Instagram handle to share a throwback photograph from his first meeting with American actor and producer Robert De Niro.

Joe Biden says Putin on 'balls of his heels' as Ukraine aid dries up

Bloomberg / Feb 08, 2024, 09:36 (IST)

President Joe Biden will meet with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz at the White House to discuss additional support for Ukraine. The meeting aims to strengthen international efforts to assist Ukraine in its ongoing conflict with Russia. Biden has warned that Ukraine is at a critical point in the war with Russia.

Robert De Niro expresses his love for his adorable 10-month-old baby girl Gia

etimes.in / Feb 08, 2024, 08:28 (IST)

Robert De Niro, known for his iconic roles, shared his joy about his growing family, particularly his 10-month-old daughter Gia. He cherishes the wisdom he received from his own parents, Robert De Niro Sr. and Virginia Admiral, and is passing it down to his children. The Hollywood legend finds solace and joy in being fully present with his youngest daughter.

Robert De Niro has a ‘complaint’ against Apple

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Nov 29, 2023, 20:06 (IST)

The actor recently appeared onstage for the presentation of the Gotham Historical Icon and Creator Tribute to Martin Scorsese’s Killers Of The Flower Moon. This film focuses on a series of murders targeting the Osage people in Oklahoma during the 1920s after oil was discovered on tribal land and was also distributed by Apple.

Leonardo DiCaprio and Robert De Niro’s 'Killers of the Flower Moon' to make its global OTT debut on THIS date

etimes.in / Jan 05, 2024, 15:32 (IST)

Martin Scorsese’s crime drama 'Killers of the Flower Moon', starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Robert De Niro, has been receiving applause from audiences and critics since its premiere at the 76th Cannes Film Festival and will make its global OTT debut on Apple TV+ on January 12.

Actor Robert De Niro tells a jury in a lawsuit by his ex-assistant: 'This is all nonsense'

AP / Nov 01, 2023, 00:10 (IST)

Robert De Niro testified Monday in New York City at a trial resulting from a former personal assistant's lawsuit accusing the actor of being an abusive boss. De Niro, who at times appeared grouchy, restrained himself from erupting at the dissection of his interactions with her before finally blurting out: "This is all nonsense!"

Jodie Foster hates wearing high heels, sitting in make-up chair

IANS / Dec 03, 2023, 11:11 (IST)

Actress-filmmaker Jodie Foster said that she is no longer interested in wearing corsets and high heels. She also added that she hates sitting in make-up chairs on movie sets talking about her hair and eyebrows.

Robert De Niro says his Gotham Awards speech was censored

IANS / Nov 28, 2023, 15:12 (IST)

Robert De Niro claims anti-Trump comments were censored during his Gotham Awards speech. He reveals that the beginning of his speech was edited without his knowledge. De Niro criticizes the entertainment industry for not being immune to the festering disease of misinformation. He also mentions the former President's lies and disrespect towards others. Despite his disappointment with the censorship, De Niro thanks Apple and accepts the award for 'Killers of the Flower Moon'.

Ranbir Kapoor a mix of Robert De Niro, Al Pacino and Kamal Haasan: 'Animal' director Sandeep Reddy Vanga

PTI / Nov 23, 2023, 16:36 (IST)

Filmmaker Sandeep Reddy Vanga praises Ranbir Kapoor's versatility in their upcoming film "Animal", which revolves around a troubled bond between a father and son in the backdrop of the underworld. Vanga compares Kapoor to iconic actors Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, and Kamal Haasan, emphasizing his lack of limitations. The director is pleased with the teaser's reception and anticipates a blockbuster release on December 1 in multiple languages. Anil Kapoor, Bobby Deol, and Rashmika Mandanna also star in the film.
